content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_warped_hyphae
inventory=[{"type": "light_gray_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 57, "index": 17}, {"type": "pufferfish", "quantity": 4, "index": 20}, {"type": "light_gray_stained_glass", "quantity": 13, "index": 27}, {"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 4, "index": 34}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 56, "index": 38}]

thought: To craft stripped_warped_hyphae, I need to place 4 stripped_warped_stems in a square formation in the crafting table. The first step is to move one of the stems into the top left corner (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_warped_hyphae
inventory=[{"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "light_gray_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 57, "index": 17}, {"type": "pufferfish", "quantity": 4, "index": 20}, {"type": "light_gray_stained_glass", "quantity": 13, "index": 27}, {"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 3, "index": 34}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 56, "index": 38}]
thought: Next, I will move another stem to the right of the previous one (slot 2)
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_warped_hyphae
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "light_gray_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 57, "index": 17}, {"type": "pufferfish", "quantity": 4, "index": 20}, {"type": "light_gray_stained_glass", "quantity": 13, "index": 27}, {"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 2, "index": 34}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 56, "index": 38}]
thought: Next, I will move another stem below the previous one (slot 4)
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_warped_hyphae
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "light_gray_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 57, "index": 17}, {"type": "pufferfish", "quantity": 4, "index": 20}, {"type": "light_gray_stained_glass", "quantity": 13, "index": 27}, {"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 56, "index": 38}]
thought: Finally, I will move another stem to the right of the previous one (slot 5), completing the square formation.
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_warped_hyphae
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_warped_hyphae", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "light_gray_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 57, "index": 17}, {"type": "pufferfish", "quantity": 4, "index": 20}, {"type": "light_gray_stained_glass", "quantity": 13, "index": 27}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 56, "index": 38}]
thought: Now that the stripped_warped_hyphae has been crafted, I will move it to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 3
